attributes.action: Promoting  Ancient English sports and games
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of E-Petition is to promote the Teaching and playing of Ancient English sports and Pasttimes in national English heritage sports day held once year

Archery
Kayle Pins Skittles
Quoits hoops over targets
Lawn Billards Croquet
Cudgel Play teaching with instructor and mask
Single stick teaching with fencing instructor and mask
Quartsfaff  with wearing fencing mask and instructor
Quantrain water joust and tilting
Hazard dice game
Nine holes in the cloister Similar to Eton Fives
Sword and Buckler in controlled setting with instructor
Aunt Sally Coconut shire doll peg game
Hawking Falconery
Stoolball


This could be Ancient English sports and pasttimes be part of national day on May day and Easter and by
forming new association

rejection.details: This does not need any Government involvement?
